Bubow.name: Bubow
Bubow.description:
Bubow, Otusky, and Strikite

Element Air

Attribute Modifiers Str +0, Dex +3, Con +2, Int -1, Wis +4, Cha +1

Eldamon Language Sussuran

Eldamon Hit Points 4

Eldamon Skills Acrobatics, Performance, Stealth

Eldamon Saving Throw Reflex

Senses low-light vision

Resistance air, body, earth, plant, wood

Weaknesses cold, electricity, metal, teleportation

Speed 10 feet, fly 25 feet

Melee 1 claw (agile, finesse; reach 10 feet when evolved only); Damage 1d4 slashing (1d6 slashing when evolved only)

Melee 1 beak (finesse; reach 10 feet when evolved only); Damage 1d4 piercing (1d6 piercing when evolved only)

Evolution Condition Helping bubow discover a truly beautiful tableau of colors or view a magnificent rainbow.

Elemental Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.ZU2Lnfg9jtGmagkU]{Wind’s Mobility}Air rushes past you as you move, making it harder for your foes to harm you as long as you’re in motion. While you’re moving, you’re concealed and gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC. This only applies when you’re in the midst of your own movement, not when you’re moving due to the actions of another, such as when riding a vehicle or a mount.

Form Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.qqEF4dlRrjqxy0Cu]{Kite Tail}Your rainbow-colored kite tail can fascinate foes, forcing them to focus their attention on you. You can use your kite tail to Perform, rolling a Performance check against the Will DC of a single creature within 30 feet. On a success, that creature is fascinated with you for 1 round, or for 2 rounds on a critical success.

Evolution Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.VXZVjSlp7PvJ6y4k]{Protective Wings}Your huge wings are especially solid compared to other air eldamon. As a single action, you can interpose your wings. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC and Reflex saves until the beginning of your next turn, and you increase the circumstance bonus to AC from wind’s mobility to +4 for the same duration.

Cerebella.description:
Cerebella, Cerebro, and Cereboss

Element Mind

Attribute Modifiers Str +0, Dex +1, Con +3, Int +2, Wis +4, Cha - 1

Eldamon Language Astral

Eldamon Hit Points 4

Eldamon Skills Arcana, Nature, Occultism

Eldamon Saving Throw Will

Senses low-light vision (darkvision when evolved only)

Resistance electricity, light, mind, teleportation

Weaknesses darkness, sonic, spirit, time

Speed 25 feet

Melee 1 ridge (agile, finesse; battle form only); Damage 1d4 slashing

Melee 1 jaws (agile, finesse; evolved form only); Damage 1d6 piercing

Evolution Condition Helping cerebella master trivia to an excessive degree.

Elemental Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.pWdBYk5elIxs5yrB]{Magical Disruption}Your powers that stupefy foes disrupt spellcasting more than normal. The flat check DC to Cast a Spell while stupefied by your mind powers increases from 5 plus the stupefied condition’s value to 7 plus the stupefied condition’s value.

Form Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.85pRkq8dYxZpORYf]{Brainpower}Thanks to bring a brain, when you’re phased in, you can focus more easily than other eldamon on proximal threats to remember more about them. When phased in during a combat encounter, you can Recall Knowledge about the creatures you’re fighting, and you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to do so. Each time you use Rush of Insight to Recall Knowledge, you can choose whether you Recall Knowledge or your mortal friend Recalls Knowledge.

Evolution Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.H5lBN3abwTKFf71m]{Brains in a Jar}You multiprocesses thoughts through the brains in your jar, allowing you to fail gracefully and elude mental effects. When you fail a Will save, you can shunt the effects into your subsidiary brains in order to reroll the saving throw and take the better result; this is a fortune effect. If you do, your subsidiary brains are out of commission for 1 hour, and you can’t use this ability again until then.

Cerebella.name: Cerebella

Centesla.name: Centesla
Centesla.description:
Centesla, Capacipod, and Dielectripede

Element Electricity

Attribute Modifiers Str -1, Dex +3, Con +2, Int +1, Wis +4, Cha +0

Eldamon Language Voltan

Eldamon Hit Points 6

Eldamon Skills Acrobatics, Stealth, Survival

Eldamon Saving Throw Reflex

Senses low-light vision

Resistance air, electricity, metal

Weaknesses earth, mental, teleportation

Speed 25 feet

Melee 1 tail (agile, finesse; reach 10 feet when evolved only); Damage 1d4 electricity (1d6 electricity when evolved only)

Evolution Condition Helping centesla satisfy their completionism.

Elemental Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.Qdf40NoED5Cbne6q]{Segmented Capacitor}You’ve segmented off your electric charge, granting you higher capacity. You can become charged up to charged 4, instead of charged 3. Once per 10 minutes, when you are charged 2 and would gain a single charge from an electricity power, you become charged 4 instead of charged 3; this has no effect if you weren’t already charged 2 before using the power.

Form Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.dzdOBufG2Rg1lYQZ]{So Many Legs}Due to your extreme number of legs, it’s difficult to knock you prone. You gain a +4 circumstance bonus to Fortitude and Reflex saves and DCs against effects that would knock you prone.

Evolution Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.hLRE2LmdivhosBTM]{Constant Bolts}As long as you’re charged, your capacitors shoot off superfluous lightning bolts. Any foe that ends its turn adjacent to you takes an amount of electricity damage equal to twice your charged value; this damage doesn’t make it lose the shocked condition. At 15th level, this damage increases to three times your charged value.

Cephalittle.name: Cephalittle
Cephalittle.description:
Cephalittle, Cephalocus, and Cephalord

Element Force

Attribute Modifiers Str +0, Dex +3, Con +2, Int +1, Wis +4, Cha -1

Eldamon Language Aetheran

Eldamon Hit Points 6

Eldamon Skills Acrobatics, Athletics, Survival

Eldamon Saving Throw Reflex

Senses low-light vision

Resistance force, spirit

Weaknesses death, light

Speed 25 feet

Melee 1 arm (agile, finesse, reach 10 feet when evolved only); Damage 1d4 bludgeoning (1d6 bludgeoning when evolved only)

Evolution Condition Helping cephalittle solve a groundbreaking problem in geometry or otherwise reach a great geometric breakthrough.

Elemental Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.VsPev9eq3S4rJcyj]{Locus of Force}Your understanding of geometry allows you to apply your force across a wider locus of points. The range of your force powers that have a range increases by 20 feet. This only affects the range at which you can affect targets; it doesn’t increase the distance you can reposition them. The area of your burst, cone, and emanation force powers increases by 5 feet in length or radius. If you’re an expert in power DCs, the area increases by 10 feet in length or radius instead.

Form Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.UiQL5TyrOwc1Wnok]{Locus Arms}Your arms are myriad, powered by force energy, and geometrically stable as you move across the ground. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your Fortitude or Reflex DC against attempts to Shove or Trip you. This bonus also applies to saving throws against spells or effects that attempt to move you or knock you prone. When an effect would force you to move while you are near a wall, ceiling, or other edge with easy handholds, you can attempt to Grab an Edge with your arms to reduce the forced movement by 20 feet on a success or 30 feet on a critical success, instead of reducing falling distance.

Evolution Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.VhilwpnMj1dHypAX]{Aetheric Third Eye}You have a third eye of aether, concentrated force energy mixed with etheric essence into elemental form, and that third eye allows you to perceive things geometrically through forces. You automatically succeed on flat checks to target concealed or hidden creatures.

Chillot.name: Chillot
Chillot.description:
Chillot, Blizzotter, and Glaciotter

Element Ice

Attribute Modifiers Str -1, Dex +3, Con +2, Int +0, Wis +4, Cha +1

Eldamon Language Cryan

Eldamon Hit Points 6

Eldamon Skills Acrobatics, Intimidation, Stealth

Eldamon Saving Throw Reflex

Senses ghost sniffer, low-light vision

Resistance cold, plant, sonic, time, wood

Weaknesses body, earth, fire, metal

Speed 25 feet

Melee 1 tail (agile, finesse; reach 10 feet when evolved only); Damage 1d4 cold (1d6 cold when evolved only)

Evolution Condition Helping chillot learn truly spine-tingling ghost stories.

Elemental Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.aoxtrbfc9C18H6ym]{Veins of Ice}The cold pumping through your body chills out most forms of persistent damage, making it harder for them to last. Your flat check DC against persistent damage other than mental, vitality, and void damage (which attack your mind or life force directly) decreases from DC 15 to DC 12, or from DC 10 to DC 7 with especially effective assistance.

Form Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.SjaU9bkkjjB4oANe]{Ghost Sniffer}You have scent as an imprecise sense out to 30 feet (halved and doubled as normal for scent when smelling upwind or downwind), except the scent can only smell ghosts, spirits, haunts, and other incorporeal creatures. If the creature is incorporeal and fully within a solid object, ghost sniffer doesn’t notice them unless you actively sniffs the object while within the same or an adjacent square, which requires a single action.

Evolution Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.VIWsHQDE27ALPsM9]{Dauntless}Some call you cold-blooded, others call you fearless. Either way, things others find scary you normally just find exciting. Whenever you gain the frightened condition, you reduce the frightened value by 1.

Coolibou.name: Coolibou
Coolibou.description:
Coolibou, Rangifroze, and Cariboreas

Element Ice

Attribute Modifiers Str +0, Dex +2, Con +3, Int -1, Wis +4, Cha +1

Eldamon Language Cryan

Eldamon Hit Points 6

Eldamon Skills Athletics, Intimidation, Survival

Eldamon Saving Throw Fortitude

Senses low-light vision

Resistance cold, plant, sonic, time, wood

Weaknesses body, earth, fire, metal

Speed 25 feet

Melee 1 antler (agile, finesse; reach 10 feet when evolved only); Damage 1d4 cold (1d6 cold when evolved only)

Evolution Condition Helping coolibou give and receive wonderful gifts.

Elemental Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.cKpzW0DNqbOLHCnR]{Deep Accumulation}When your ice powers accumulate the frozen condition on a creature, the maximum value for the frozen condition increases by 2 (starting at 7, to a maximum of 12 at 20th level).

Form Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.RmH7yV0Ka43jWeRM]{Snow Fur}Your fluffy snowlike fur grants you protection against creatures’ attacks the more their chill accumulates. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC against a creature’s attacks when they are frozen 3 or more from your ice powers, which increases to +2 when they are frozen 6 or more, +3 when they are frozen 9 or more, and +4 when they are frozen 12 or more.

Evolution Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.U7bJ1OMkU5j0JOn7]{Portal Antlers}You can use the elemental ice portal between your antlers to aim your ice powers. Choose any space within your antlers’ 10- foot reach as the origin point for any of your ice powers. This not only allows you to effectively increase their range by 10 feet in most cases, but also allows you to position area effects more advantageously.

Etmoist.name: Etmoist
Etmoist.description:
Etmoist, Carcharain, and Megalodrown

Element Water

Attribute Modifiers Str +2, Dex +1, Con +3, Int -1, Wis +4, Cha +0

Eldamon Language Thalassic

Eldamon Hit Points 6

Eldamon Skills Acrobatics, Athletics, Intimidation

Eldamon Saving Throw Fortitude

Senses low-light vision

Resistance fire, water

Weaknesses electricity, plant, wood

Speed 20 feet, swim 25 feet

Melee 1 jaws (reach 10 feet when evolved only); Damage 1d6 piercing (1d8 piercing when evolved only)

Evolution Condition Helping etmoist truly come to see the meaning of family.

Elemental Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.ucQ39u12ZltQeNHe]{Raging Cycle}Your power and defenses fluctuate with the tides. After using a high tide power, you take a -1 penalty to your AC for 1 round. After using a low tide power, you gain a +1 status bonus to AC for 1 round. When using a high tide water power, you gain a +2 status bonus to damage rolls. This increases to +3 if you’re an expert in power DCs, +4 if you’re a master in power DCs, and +5 if you’re legendary in power DCs.

Form Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.4YVeOMiqwqIr6YIT]{Crimson Gullet}The raging water energy within you glows crimson when you’re ready to use a high tide power. When you’re in high tide, you add the status bonus to damage rolls from raging cycle to your unarmed jaws Strikes. Additionally, if you succeed at a Grapple check to grab a foe in your mouth, they take an amount of bludgeoning damage equal to that status bonus from the rampaging water energy.

Evolution Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.8qTeTA7v5fnkBRwG]{Armor Spikes}You are covered in armored spikes that pierce your foes. A creature that attempts a melee unarmed Strike or a non-reach melee Strike against you (whether or not it hits you) takes 4 piercing damage, with a basic Reflex save against your power DC. At 19th level, this increases to 5 piercing damage.

Geopher.name: Geopher
Geopher.description:
Geopher, Geomys, and Geomyte

Element Earth

Attribute Modifiers Str +2, Dex +1, Con +3, Int +0, Wis +4, Cha -1

Eldamon Language Petran

Eldamon Hit Points 8

Eldamon Skills Athletics, Stealth, Survival

Eldamon Saving Throw Fortitude

Senses low-light vision

Resistance earth, electricity, fire, teleportation

Weaknesses air, plant, sonic, water, wood

Speed 25 feet

Melee 1 claw (reach 10 feet when evolved only); Damage 1d6 slashing (1d8 slashing when evolved only)

Evolution Condition Helping geopher dig their way to a truly extraordinary find.

Elemental Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.FwMn8ONkIQsCaxLs]{Harden Soil}You have greater control over hardening earth magic, allowing you to become slightly more resistant to damage. When an earth power grants you resistance or hardness based on your level, you gain resistance or hardness as if your level was 1 higher than normal.

Form Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.htvEhPb3SwbvQez9]{Rending Claws}Your claws and powers more easily dig through solid objects. Your claw Strikes and earth powers ignore an amount of Hardness equal to half your level (minimum 1); as normal, this has no effect on resistance.

Evolution Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.nFj4DtbQBlA6ud39]{Shovelling Dig}You can use your shovel tail to quickly dig your way across the battlefield. You gain a 20 foot burrow Speed, allowing you to dig through soft earth and other surfaces of similar consistency.

Kitopaz.description:
Kitopaz, Kitefnut, and Qitophet

Element Earth

Attribute Modifiers Str +0, Dex +2, Con +3, Int -1, Wis +4, Cha +1

Eldamon Language Petran

Eldamon Hit Points 8

Eldamon Skills Intimidation, Stealth, Survival

Eldamon Saving Throw Fortitude

Senses low-light vision

Resistance earth, electricity, fire, teleportation

Weaknesses air, plant, sonic, water, wood

Speed 25 feet

Melee 1 claw (agile, finesse; reach 10 feet when evolved only); Damage 1d4 slashing (1d6 slashing when evolved only)

Evolution Condition Helping kitopaz obtain shiny things and reach peak enlightenment in the art of all that is shiny.

Elemental Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.N6ax9EnOe0yNIUZ4]{Strength of the Earth}The earth itself provides you with overflowing energy that protects you from harm. During an encounter, if you start your turn on the ground, in direct contact with a rock or earthen surface, you gain 1 temporary Hit Point until the beginning of your next turn. This increases to 2 temporary Hit Points if you’re an expert in power DC, 3 temporary Hit Points if you’re a master in power DC, and 4 temporary Hit Points if you’re legendary in power DC.

Form Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.p6o2wewulQ1HOgok]{Regal Nemes}Your shiny headdress proves you once and for all as truly regal and magnificent, while protecting you from effects that would seek to steal your sovereignty. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against emotion effects and effects that apply the confused or controlled condition. If you roll a success on a saving throw against such an effect, you get a critical success instead.

Evolution Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.rBD1MWnMSFTX6WQa]{Crystalline Guard}The many crystals throughout your body allow earth energy to flow through you easily and store within the crystals to release when needed. At the end of your turn, you can choose to deplete your energy to gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your AC until the beginning of your next turn. If you do, you can’t do so again until you refresh at least three times to replenish the missing energy. Since you refresh instantly after an encounter, you can also replenish your crystalline guard swiftly.

Kitopaz.name: Kitopaz

Kuddle.description:
Kuddle, Seapia, and Apamare

Element Water

Attribute Modifiers Str +1, Dex +2, Con +3, Int -1, Wis +4, Cha +0

Eldamon Language Thalassic

Eldamon Hit Points 6

Eldamon Skills Acrobatics, Athletics, Stealth

Eldamon Saving Throw Fortitude

Senses low-light vision

Resistance fire, water

Weaknesses electricity, plant, wood

Speed 20 feet, swim 25 feet

Melee 1 arm (agile, finesse, reach 10 feet when evolved only); Damage 1d4 bludgeoning (1d6 bludgeoning when evolved only)

Evolution Condition Helping kuddle perfect the art of hugging.

Elemental Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.tPB9IlrH2Qnfaq96]{Tentacles of Water} You can transform the motive force of your water powers into tendrils that throw off your foes’ stance instead. If your water power would move a foe at least 10 feet, you can choose not to move the foe and instead make them off-guard until the beginning of your next turn. If your water power would move them at least 20 feet and you choose not to move them, they become off-guard until the end of your next turn, and if it would move them at least 40 feet and you choose not to move them, they become off-guard for 2 rounds.

Form Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.2lJEWdILSxX3bl2U]{Grappling Arms} Your many arms can easily grapple foes, even after using power attacks. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to Grapple, and your Athletics checks to Grapple don’t apply the multiple attack penalty from powers with the attack trait (they still apply other multiple attack penalties, and they still increase your multiple attack penalty). If you’re in your evolved form, the circumstance bonus to Athletics checks to Grapple increases to +2.

Evolution Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.7kh2da0lfnLobYOa]{Camouflage} You can transform to any color necessary to blend in with your environment. You can Hide and Sneak even without cover or being concealed.

Myrmind.name: Myrmind
Myrmind.description:
Myrmind, Formipsy, and Hymontops

Element Mind

Attribute Modifiers Str -1, Dex +2, Con +3, Int +1, Wis +4, Cha +0

Eldamon Language Astral

Eldamon Hit Points 4

Eldamon Skills Acrobatics, Stealth, Survival

Eldamon Saving Throw Will

Senses low-light vision (darkvision when evolved only)

Resistance electricity, light, mind, teleportation

Weaknesses darkness, sonic, spirit, time

Speed 25 feet

Melee 1 mandibles (agile, finesse, reach 10 feet when evolved only); Damage 1d4 slashing (1d6 slashing when evolved only)

Evolution Condition Helping myrmind truly become part of a group and fully embody their role in it.

Elemental Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.ql59GluvNv5neoLW]{Mental Assistance}Your powers hone in on the enemies’ weak points to help your allies strike your foes. After you use an active mental power against one or more foes, choose one foe that you successfully hit with a power attack roll or that failed their saving throw against your power. Your next ally to make an attack roll against that foe before your next turn gains a +1 circumstance bonus to their attack roll.

Form Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.APmYpY8f7xnJ2Mf9]{Hivemind Antennae}Thanks to your connection to your allies, your antennae pick up your foes’ movements. Unless all your allies are also flanked, you aren’t off-guard to flanking creatures of your level or lower. However, they can still help their allies flank. You also aren’t off-guard to hidden or undetected creatures of your level or lower unless they’re hidden or undetected to all your allies.

Evolution Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.Hi8umqSgfZtNN9wx]{Compound Eyes}Your many compound eyes help you see more easily and transmit your visual data to help your allies avoid attacks. You gain darkvision and a +2 circumstance bonus to visual Perception checks. Whenever you Seek, you can Seek in two areas instead of one, and when you Search, you Search twice as quickly. Your allies aren’t off-guard to hidden or undetected creatures of your level or lower as long as the creatures aren’t hidden or undetected to you.

Pangeolil.name: Pangeolil
Pangeolil.description:
Pangeolil, Petrolin, and Pholith

Element Earth

Attribute Modifiers Str +1, Dex +2, Con +3, Int +0, Wis +4, Cha - 1

Eldamon Language Petran

Eldamon Hit Points 8

Eldamon Skills Athletics, Acrobatics, Survival

Eldamon Saving Throw Fortitude

Senses low-light vision

Resistance earth, electricity, fire, teleportation

Weaknesses air, plant, sonic, water, wood

Speed 25 feet

Melee 1 claw; Damage 1d6 slashing (1d8 slashing when evolved only)

Melee 1 tail (agile, finesse; reach 10 feet and versatile piercing both when evolved only); Damage 1d4 bludgeoning (1d6 bludgeoning when evolved only)

Evolution Condition Helping pangeolil learn and keep an especially deep or important secret.

Elemental Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.KjRBwjfInfyNy7QF]{Earth’s Vengeance}Creatures who damage you find quick comeuppance. After a creature damages you, when your earth powers damage that creatures, you gain a +1 status bonus to the power’s damage for 24 hours. This increases to +2 if you’re an expert in power DC, +3 if you’re a master in power DC, and +4 if you’re legendary in power DC. If the earth power deals damage in direct response to a creature’s attacks against you (such as Rebounding Embrace or Vengeful Backlash), the status bonus to damage increases by 2 (to a maximum of +6 if you’re legendary in power DC).

Form Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.mrbKy5kEDH2PDEhJ]{Curl Up}As a single action, you can Curl Up. If you do, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC (or increase you standard cover to greater cover if you already have standard cover) and are immobilized, can’t make unarmed attacks, and can’t use powers except reaction powers. A creature that hits you with a melee unarmed Strike or a non-reach melee Strike while you’re curled up takes 1 piercing damage, plus 1 additional piercing damage for every 4 levels you have beyond 1st, to a maximum of 5 damage at 19th level, with a basic Reflex save against your power DC. These effects last until the end of your next turn, though you can end the effect early with a single action.

Evolution Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.jyx6GZEWlyuSh1km]{Countless Spikes}Your spikes are everywhere, presenting a threat even when you aren’t curled up and making your foes bleed when you are. A creature that attempts a melee unarmed Strike or a non-reach melee Strike against you (whether or not you’re Curled Up and whether or not it hits you) takes 1 piercing damage, plus 1 additional piercing damage for every 4 levels you have beyond 1st, to a maximum of 5 damage at 19th level, with a basic Reflex save against your power DC. This replaces the damage from Curl Up. However, if you’re Curled Up, a creature that fails their Reflex save also takes an equal amount of persistent bleed damage.

Peepkin.name: Peepkin
Peepkin.description:
Peepkin, Gourdian, and Pumpkinight

Element Wood

Attribute Modifiers Str +0, Dex +3, Con +2, Int -1, Wis +4, Cha +1

Eldamon Language Muan

Eldamon Hit Points 6

Eldamon Skills Acrobatics, Intimidation, Stealth

Eldamon Saving Throw Reflex

Senses low-light vision

Resistance earth, plant, time, water, wood

Weaknesses acid, air, cold, fire, poison

Speed 25 feet

Melee 1 claw (agile, finesse; only usable in battle form); Damage 1d4 slashing

Melee 1 blade arm (finesse, reach 10 feet, versatile P; only usable in evolved form); Damage 1d8 slashing

Evolution Condition Helping peepkin celebrate with truly wonderful decorations.

Elemental Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.x0YjbkJ58QreUqWu]{Harvest Celebration}Whenever you harvest, you celebrate as the wood energy courses through you. After using a power and choosing to harvest, if you harvested at least one plant, you gain a +1 status bonus to Perception checks, skill checks, and saving throws for 1 round. If you’re legendary in power DCs, you instead gain a +2 status bonus to Perception checks, skill checks, and saving throws.

Form Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.3KgLp71zdGslwGpp]{Trick or Treat}You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Intimidation checks to Demoralize. When you harvest plants in a square with a foe in it, that foe is no longer temporarily immune to your Demoralize.

Evolution Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.0BpNDMzHkkn7DJVe]{Wooden Sword and Shield}Your claws transform into the shape of a wooden sword and shield. This changes your claw unarmed attack into a blade arm unarmed attack that deals 1d8 slashing damage, loses the agile trait, and gains the versatile P trait; this is already reflected in the statistics above. Additionally, you can use your shield arm to Raise a Shield, with the effects of a wooden shield with 10 Hardness, 60 HP and a BT of 30. You gain the Shield Block reaction, which you can only use with your shield arm. When you refresh, your shield arm recovers all its Hit Points, even if it was destroyed.

Power Progession

Phidi.name: Phidi
Phidi.description:
Phidi, Caduceon, and Colubrio

Element Life

Attribute Modifiers Str -1, Dex +3, Con +2, Int +1, Wis +4, Cha +0

Eldamon Language Jyoti

Eldamon Hit Points 8

Eldamon Skills Acrobatics, Medicine (doesn’t need hands or healer’s tools), Stealth

Eldamon Saving Throw Will

Senses low-light vision

Resistance light, vitality (since it isn’t undead, it can’t normally be harmed by vitality)

Weaknesses darkness, death, shadow

Speed 25 feet

Melee 1 claw (fangs (agile, finesse; reach 10 feet when evolved only); Damage 1d4 piercing plus 1 additional vitality (1d6 piercing plus 1 additional vitality when evolved only)

Evolution Condition Helping phidi discover a true medical breakthrough.

Elemental Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.itvQjsVs8RILKYEN]{Caduceus Flow}When you help others, the overflowing life energy protects you as well. Whenever you use a life power that benefits one or more allies, but does not benefit yourself, you gain 1 temporary Hit Point until the beginning of your next turn. This increases to 2 temporary Hit Points if you’re an expert in power DC, 3 temporary Hit Points if you’re a master in power DC, and 4 temporary Hit Points if you’re legendary in power DC.

Form Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.LaoF7fcqDRR4rYCx]{Double Senses}Even when it isn’t visible, your life force duplicate assists your senses. You’re an expert in Perception, and at 9th level, you become a master in Perception.

Evolution Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.QeutdbOGPJliW7Hg]{Crystallize Life}You store crystallized life energy in golden jewels along your body. and you’re phased in or when you first phase in during an encounter, you deplete some of the stored energy to gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level, which last for 1 round.

Porcute.name: Porcute
Porcute.description:
Porcute, Elecupine, and Erethizap

Element Electricity

Attribute Modifiers Str +2, Dex +1, Con +3, Int -1, Wis +4, Cha +0

Eldamon Language Voltan

Eldamon Hit Points 6

Eldamon Skills Athletics, Intimidation, Survival

Eldamon Saving Throw Will

Senses low-light vision

Resistance air, electricity, metal

Weaknesses earth, mental, teleportation

Speed 25 feet

Melee 1 quill (agile, finesse; reach 10 feet when evolved only); Damage 1d6 electricity (1d8 electricity when evolved only)

Evolution Condition Helping porcute keep their word and hold fast to their code against harsh odds.

Elemental Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.L66kbQGfCYhMLjuh]{Jolt Spines}When a foe fumbles an attack, they strike a needle of electricity arcing across your body, shocking them. Whenever a foe critically fails an attack roll against you with a melee unarmed attack, or an adjacent foe critically fails any melee attack roll against you, they take 2 electricity damage. This damage increase to 4 if you’re an expert in power DCs, 6 if you’re a master in power DCs, and 8 if you’re legendary in power DCs. They then become shocked for 1 round.

Form Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.dNBbI0feV4Bb7xuR]{Defensive Quills}A creature that hits you with a melee unarmed Strike or a non-reach melee Strike takes piercing damage equal to half your level (minimum 1), with a basic Reflex save against your power DC.

Evolution Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.hR98QHVHLFFTSGHE]{Protective Armor}You wear electrified heavy armor. Your item bonus to AC from armor increases to +6, your maximum Dexterity modifier decreases to +0, and your Speed decreases to 20 feet.

Potfox.name: Potfox
Potfox.description:
Potfox, Kankoldron, and Kankawen

Element Force

Attribute Modifiers Str -1, Dex +2, Con +3, Int +1, Wis +4, Cha +0

Eldamon Language Aetheran

Eldamon Hit Points 6

Eldamon Skills Athletics, Cooking Lore, Intimidation

Eldamon Saving Throw Fortitude

Senses low-light vision

Resistance force, spirit

Weaknesses death, light

Speed 25 feet

Melee 1 leg (agile, finesse, reach 10 feet when evolved only); Damage 1d4 bludgeoning (1d6 bludgeoning when evolved only)

Evolution Condition Helping potfox become a brewmaster with many recipes.

Elemental Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.Rx74fcdV2tZuPjMm]{Stir the Pot} When you reposition a foe using your force powers, you can move them just a little bit more. Whenever your force power allows you to reposition a foe 10 feet or more, you can reposition them 5 more feet. If your force power allows you to reposition a foe 30 feet or more, you can reposition them 10 more feet instead.

Form Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.WrJfzqOzfZLiSZMs]{Have Pot, Will Travel} Part of your form is a living pot, which you can use for protection. As a single action, you can Retreat Into your Pot. If you do, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC and are immobilized. These effects last until the end of your next turn, though you can end the effect early with a single action.

Evolution Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.azH8AiO8XAJDkuRV]{Foxforce} Your dancing wisps of fox force briefly reveal hidden creatures similarly to faerie fire. When you hit a creature with a power attack roll with a force power and it takes force damage, or a creature fails its saving throw against your force power and it takes force damage, if the creature was invisible, it becomes concealed instead, and if it was visible, it can’t be concealed. This effect lasts until the end of your next turn.

Skepi.description:
Skepi, Heidrun, and Khnumen

Element Life

Attribute Modifiers Str +0, Dex +3, Con +2, Int -1, Wis +4, Cha +1

Eldamon Language Jyoti

Eldamon Hit Points 8

Eldamon Skills Acrobatics, Intimidation, Survival

Eldamon Saving Throw Reflex

Senses low-light vision

Resistance light, vitality (since it isn’t undead, it can’t normally be harmed by vitality)

Weaknesses darkness, death, shadow

Speed 25 feet

Melee 1 horn (agile, finesse; reach 10 feet when evolved only); Damage 1d4 piercing plus 1 additional vitality (1d6 piercing plus 1 additional vitality when evolved only)

Evolution Condition Helping skepi save others and protect the helpless.

Elemental Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.fMSZeNqPduzkyc1o]{Scapegoat}Whenever an adjacent ally takes damage and you are conscious with more than 1 Hit Point, you lose 1 Hit Point (or the amount of damage, whichever is less) and reduce the damage they take by the same amount. If you are a master in power DCs and have more than 2 Hit Points, you lose 2 Hit Points instead of 1.

Form Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.PS08QFpgf1BKKv30]{Lifeguard Hair}Your tufts of red hair repel destruction when you are close to death. When you have fewer than half your maximum Hit Points, you gain resistance 1 to all damage types. If you are a master in power DCs, this increases to resistance 2 to all damage types.

Evolution Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.QyBl4HgiuZHMILqs]{Garland of Salvation}Your garland commemorates those you have saved, and it empowers you whenever you sacrifice yourself for others. After taking damage to protect another from harm or losing Hit Points to protect another from harm (such as from your scapegoat ability), you gain a +1 status bonus to AC and saving throws until the end of your next turn.

Skolld.description:
Skolld, Amarime, and Fenrice

Element Ice

Attribute Modifiers Str +1, Dex +2, Con +3, Int -1, Wis +4, Cha +0

Eldamon Language Cryan

Eldamon Hit Points 6

Eldamon Skills Athletics, Intimidation, Stealth

Eldamon Saving Throw Fortitude

Senses low-light vision

Resistance cold, plant, sonic, time, wood

Weaknesses body, earth, fire, metal

Speed 25 feet

Melee 1 jaws (agile, finesse; reach 10 feet when evolved only); Damage 1d4 cold (1d6 cold when evolved only)

Melee 1 claw (reach 10 feet when evolved only); Damage 1d6 slashing (1d8 slashing when evolved only)

Evolution Condition Helping skolld guard what matters to them most.

Elemental Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.gBUUThIKgqNsZgZS]{Clinging Frost}The ice, frost, and snow you call forth lingers and sticks to its targets. An Interact action to reduce the value of the frozen condition doesn’t reduce the frozen value below 1 unless the creature is frozen 1; the creature then becomes temporarily immune to clinging frost for 1 minute.

Form Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.PxzT9stuFOCAHGv3]{Interposing Guardian}You get in the way of attacks against those you wish to protect. You provide standard cover instead of lesser cover against attacks through your space when you wish to do so.

Evolution Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.ShmfYYT4xc6rhBXf]{Frozen Soul}You cling to consciousness when necessary to protect what matters to you. When you are dropped to 0 Hit Points by damage, you remain at 1 Hit Point instead. Afterward, you can’t benefit from frozen soul for 1 hour.

Soleo, Soleone, and Soleonidas

Element Light

Attribute Modifiers Str +2, Dex +1, Con +3, Int -1, Wis +4, Cha +0

Eldamon Language Luxan

Eldamon Hit Points 6

Eldamon Skills Acrobatics, Athletics, Intimidation

Eldamon Saving Throw Fortitude

Senses low-light vision

Resistance death, force, light

Weaknesses darkness, mental, shadow, sonic

Speed 20 feet

Melee 1 jaws (reach 10 feet when evolved only); Damage 1d6 piercing (1d8 piercing when evolved only)

Evolution Condition Helping soleo understand the true meaning of courage or perform a heroic act of true bravery.

Elemental Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.l76OEXk9cVncXcOO]{Dazzling Sparkles}Your light sparkles and twinkles more extensively than most, causing the dazzled condition to be more severe. The DC for the concealment flat check from your dazzled condition increases from 5 to 6 (or from 7 to 8 for the Intensify Glare reaction.

Form Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.IFjyIT33ZW4u483M]{Armor of Light}You wear armor formed of hardened light. Your item bonus to AC from armor increases to +4, your maximum Dexterity modifier decreases to +1, and your Speed decreases to 20 feet (reflected in the statistics above).

Evolution Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.OVNX4uuInXa6zM9m]{Courageous Sparkle}The light within you sparkles across your armor and body. Your item bonus to AC from your armor of light increases to +5. At the end of your turn when you have the frightened condition, you sparkle mightily, and the condition reduces by 2 instead of 1; if you reduce your frightened condition by 2 in this way and the creature that gave you the frightened condition is within 30 feet, it becomes dazzled for 1 round by the sparkles.

Speculil.name: Speculil
Speculil.description:
Speculil, Speculight, and Specuspright

Element Light

Attribute Modifiers Str -1, Dex +3, Con +2, Int +0, Wis +4, Cha +1

Eldamon Language Luxan

Eldamon Hit Points 6

Eldamon Skills Acrobatics, Deception, Stealth

Eldamon Saving Throw Will

Senses low-light vision

Resistance death, force, light

Weaknesses darkness, mental, shadow, sonic

Speed 25 feet (fly 40 feet when evolved only)

Melee 1mirror (agile, finesse, reach 10 feet when evolved only); Damage 1d4 bludgeoning (1d6 bludgeoning when evolved only)

Evolution Condition Helping speculil truly reflect on their inner self and discover the secret truths hidden within.

Elemental Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.m5Wbjs3sv6Bl3GH1]{Repel Light} You use the power of mirrors to repel foes limned in your light. You gain a +1 status bonus to AC against foes limned by your light powers or surges.

Form Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.BGnFqlEqIcJXBvTF]{Mirrored Rebound}When a foe’s magic misses you completely, you use your stored light energy to bounce the magic back at them. While your mirror has light energy stored up, when a foe critically fails an attack roll with a spell or power against you, they must reroll the attack roll with their same modifier against themself. If they hit, they deal the effects of their spell or power to themself. This uses the stored light energy, which returns over the course of the next 10 minutes.

Evolution Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.KqSwWmFXwQc1A0By]{Inner Truth}Instead of becoming Large, your evolved form peels away all pretensions and reveals your inner corner, transforming you into a Tiny fairy with mirror wings and a fly Speed of 40 feet.

Elemental Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.Q9K7bNPB17QuJCh9]{Undying Flame}It’s particularly hard for others to put out your flames, and even an effective form of assistance helps less than usual. The flat check DCs for the persistent fire damage from your elemental powers increase from DC 15 to DC 16, or from DC 10 to DC 12 after especially effective assistance.

Form Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.YALRUwgm0VLgs4fP]{Iguana’s Verve}You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your saving throws against paralysis and sleep. If you roll a success against either condition, you get a critical success instead, and if you would be paralyzed or put to sleep for at least 2 rounds, reduce that duration by 1 round.

Evolution Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.cXczKQAI6qcflInp]{Deep Burns}The undying flame in your tail empowers your burning attacks. You gain a +2 status bonus to persistent fire damage you deal with your powers.

Bakindle.description:
Bakindle, Loxidate, and Volcammoth

Element Fire

Attribute Modifiers Str +2, Dex +1, Con +3, Int +0, Wis +4, Cha - 1

Eldamon Language Pyric

Eldamon Hit Points 6

Eldamon Skills Athletics, Intimidation, Survival

Eldamon Saving Throw Fortitude

Weaknesses cold, earth, water

Speed 25 feet

Melee 1 trunk (agile, finesse; reach 10 feet when evolved only); Damage 1d4 fire (1d6 fire when evolved only)

Melee 1 foot; Damage 1d6 bludgeoning (1d8 bludgeoning when evolved only)

Evolution Condition Helping bakindle make new memories and mnemonics.

Elemental Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.PMXDHztRzklyvk1i]{Firepower}Your fire powers burn brighter than others. You gain a +1 status bonus to fire damage with fire powers; this increases to +2 if you’re an expert in power DCs, +3 if you’re a master in power DCs, and +4 if you’re legendary in power DCs. As normal, this applies only to fire damage from the elemental power itself, not to persistent fire damage.

Form Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.aKwYuoY0qspJw7zT]{Unyielding Elephant}You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your Fortitude or Reflex DC against attempts to Shove or Trip you. This bonus also applies to saving throws against spells or effects that attempt to knock you prone. In addition, if any effect would force you to move 10 feet or more, you are moved only half the distance.

Evolution Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.h8t0iU2P31438pFt]{Retributive Eruption}When a creature critically hits you with a melee Strike, the volcano on your back erupts, dealing fire damage to that creature equal to half your level, with a basic Reflex save using your power DC.

Elemental Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.q56kKnt11XD6jpx8]{Surging Currents}When you move a foe at least 10 feet with your water powers, you can move them up to 5 additional feet, and when you move a foe at least 30 feet with your water powers, you can move them up to 10 additional feet.

Form Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.9tTNSSKIuem9X5N3]{Amphibious Assault}You’re especially quick both on land and in the sea. Your land Speed is 30 feet, despite being a water eldamon, and your swim Speed is 40 feet. This adjustment is included in the statblock.

Evolution Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.GJGIYsHpwxaIjZZb]{Tentacle Tail}Your tail splits into eight tentacles, increasing its reach to 20 feet. Additionally, your land Speed and swim Speed increase to 40 feet. These adjustment are included in the statblock.

Anairx.name: Anairx
Anairx.description:
Anairx, Aeshnote, and Aniscroll

Element Air

Attribute Modifiers Str +1, Dex +3, Con +2, Int +0, Wis +4, Cha -1

Eldamon Language Sussuran

Eldamon Hit Points 4

Eldamon Skills Athletics, Acrobatics, Stealth

Eldamon Saving Throw Reflex

Senses low-light vision

Resistance air, body, earth, plant, wood

Weaknesses cold, electricity, metal, teleportation

Speed 10 feet, fly 25 feet

Melee 1 foot (agile, finesse; reach 20 feet when evolved only); Damage 1d4 piercing (1d6 piercing when evolved only)

Evolution Condition Helping anairx find a truly remarkable story to read, a tale that resonates with them on a fundamental level.

Elemental Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.1TNMWrMatWAjRcjx]{Air’s Reach}You carry your powers across greater distances with wings of air. Your air powers that have a range within a certain number of feet have their range extended by an additional 50%. This has no effect on the size of an area, such as the length of a line or cone, but it does allow you to place an area effect that has a range at a further distance from you.

Form Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.vc14aj6C4y3UUIKz]{Paper Folding}You can fold yourself in order to easily fit through narrow areas. You can fit through narrow spaces as if you were two sizes smaller (a Tiny creature if you’re Medium or smaller, a Small creature if you’re Large, a Medium creature if you’re Huge, and a Large creature if you’re Gargantuan).

Evolution Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.tcoXGM3JSQXogHoF]{Parchment Furling}You can furl and unfurl your body like parchment, allowing you to grab onto multiple objects or creatures with ease and extending your reach. By unfurling itself and extending, your foot’s reach increases to 20 feet (already reflected in its statistics). Additionally, your six wings and your main body can each hold a Medium or smaller creature you Grapple, though if you don’t have at least two wings free, you can’t Fly. As long as you have at least one wing or your body free, you can use them to Grab an Edge. This doesn’t allow you to Grapple more than a single creature at once, only to hold onto more creatures than normal.

Ankhrub.name: Ankhrub
Ankhrub.description:
Ankhrub, Ankhrush, and Ankhepri

Element Life

Attribute Modifiers Str +1, Dex +2, Con +3, Int +0, Wis +4, Cha -1

Eldamon Language Jyoti

Eldamon Hit Points 8

Eldamon Skills Acrobatics, Athletics, Survival

Eldamon Saving Throw Fortitude

Senses low-light vision

Resistance light, vitality (since it isn’t undead, it can’t normally be harmed by vitality)

Weaknesses darkness, death, shadow

Speed 25 feet

Melee 1 horn (agile, finesse; reach 10 feet when evolved only); Damage 1d4 piercing plus 1 additional vitality (1d6 piercing plus 1 additional vitality when evolved only)

Evolution Condition Helping ankhrub collect good luck and health schemes that actually work.

Elemental Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.h9QCIWKzR1T7SQYT]{Scarab of Protection} The life energies within you protect you from the forces of poison, death, and disease. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against poison, death, and disease effects. If you roll a success on a saving throw against a death effect, you get a critical success instead.

Form Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.PWSnkuaoOWMQhouT]{Flutter Jump} Your wings might not be enough to fly, but they help you jump farther. You can High Jump or Long Jump as a single action without a running start, and the distance is doubled (though this still doesn’t allow you to jump farther than your Speed).

Evolution Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.TxHO0F1gmNWhrVpX]{All the Luck Charms} When you would be affected by a misfortune effect, one of your many luck charms averts misfortune; this is a fortune effect, but it doesn’t do anything but negate the misfortune effect. Afterward, you can’t benefit from this ability for 1 round.

Arbush.name: Arbush
Arbush.description:
Arbush, Arborrior, and Arbastion

Element Wood

Attribute Modifiers Str +1, Dex +2, Con +3, Int +0, Wis +4, Cha - 1

Eldamon Language Muan

Eldamon Hit Points 6

Eldamon Skills Athletics, Stealth, Survival

Eldamon Saving Throw Fortitude

Senses low-light vision

Resistance earth, plant, time, water, wood

Weaknesses acid, air, cold, fire, poison

Speed 25 feet

Melee 1 branch (agile, finesse, reach 10 feet when evolved only); Damage 1d4 bludgeoning (1d6 bludgeoning when evolved only)

Evolution Condition Helping arbush pull off the perfect joke, or a series of excellent jokes.

Elemental Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.RX4lqKmskEP1s2VQ]{Wild Growth}When you sow plants, more plants grow around you. Any time you sow with a power, sow in a square you occupy or a square adjacent to you. If you’re an expert in power DC, you sow in two such squares, if you’re a master in power DC, you sow in three such squares, and if you’re legendary in power DC, you sow in four such squares.

Form Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.OiE6z59D8zA0MFJh]{Plantwalker}You ignore any difficult or greater difficult terrain caused by plants and fungi, such as bushes, vines, and undergrowth. Even plants and fungi manipulated by magic don’t impede your progress. Additionally, you can Hide and Sneak in areas of difficult terrain caused by plants, including plants you sowed, even if they don’t provide concealment or cover.

Evolution Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.6xM2PWkH3JzbGD3G]{Moss Cover}When you’re surrounded by plants, the moss on your body provides you protection. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your AC and Reflex saves whenever you are in difficult terrain caused by plants, including plants you sowed.

Duskoyotl.name: Duskoyotl
Duskoyotl.description:
Duskoyotl, Duskoyote, and Darkoyote

Element Darkness

Attribute Modifiers Str +1, Dex +3, Con +2, Int -1, Wis +4, Cha +0

Eldamon Language Shadowtongue

Eldamon Hit Points 4

Eldamon Skills Intimidation, Stealth, Survival

Eldamon Saving Throw Reflex

Senses greater darkvision

Resistance darkness, mental, shadow, spirit

Weaknesses body, light, sonic

Speed 25 feet (35 feet in dim light or darkness)

Melee 1 jaws (agile, finesse, reach 10 feet when evolved only); Damage 1d4 piercing (1d6 piercing when evolved only)

Evolution Condition Helping duskoyotl understand both the depths and the boundaries of their dangerous obsession with fire.

Elemental Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.7LgPNyNCvGSMyjRA]{Shrouded Grace}When you’re shrouded in darkness, you can move faster, as the shadows push you where you want to go. While you have the shrouded condition, you gain a +10-foot circumstance bonus to your Speeds, and you can move your full Speed when you Sneak.

Form Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.w463cVBxcq1odAAg]{Shadow Dance}You dance swiftly and gracefully on the edge of shadows. You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speeds when you start your movement in an area of dim light or darkness, and while in the shadows of dim light, you ignore difficult terrain.

Evolution Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.sWnqMLFJqNwus8cn]{Mane of Shadow}Your mane of shadow swirls around you protectively in dim light. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to AC when in dim light, which increases to a +3 circumstance bonus if you’re attacked while you’re using a move action to move in dim light.

Grima.name: Grima
Grima.description:
Grima, Grimalkin, and Grimalakim

Element Death

Attribute Modifiers Str +0, Dex +3, Con +2, Int -1, Wis +4, Cha +1

Eldamon Language Requian

Eldamon Hit Points 6

Eldamon Skills Acrobatics, Athletics, Stealth

Eldamon Saving Throw Reflex

Senses low-light vision

Resistance poison, void

Weaknesses light, spirit

Speed 25 feet

Melee 1 tail (agile, finesse; reach 10 feet when evolved only); Damage 1d4 void (1d6 void when evolved only)

Evolution Condition Helping grima collect enough last breaths of creatures with sufficient levels of power or psychological importance.

Elemental Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.Bm70JF7c2P1A6vCN]{Breathtaker}When your death power kills a foe, you’re energized by their dying breath. You gain a +1 status bonus on Perception checks, saving throws, and skill checks until the end of your next turn. If you use Reap Lives on that foe while benefiting for this bonus, or if you kill a creature with Reap Lives, the status bonus increases to +2.

Form Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.s6Mq8Eav6Rf7jvfi]{Drink Breath}You drink the last breath of a dying foe when you’re nearby. If a foe dies within 5 feet of you, or if you move within 5 feet of a foe who died in the last round, you can steal their last breath as a free action. If you do, you gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level, which last for 1 round.

Evolution Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.sWz0B2GbMemNY6NH]{Thousand Breaths}The countless life essences you’ve absorbed from final breaths emerge from your body, harming foes who attack you. A creature that hits you with a melee unarmed Strike or a non-reach melee Strike takes void damage equal to half your level (minimum 1), with a basic Fortitude save against your power DC.

Hydgwyn.name: Hydgwyn
Hydgwyn.description:
Hydgwyn, Hydoom, and Hydeth

Element Death

Attribute Modifiers Str +0, Dex +2, Con +3, Int -1, Wis +4, Cha +1

Eldamon Language Requian

Eldamon Hit Points 6

Eldamon Skills Acrobatics, Athletics, Deception

Eldamon Saving Throw Fortitude

Senses low-light vision

Resistance poison, void

Weaknesses light, spirit

Speed 25 feet

Melee 1 antler (finesse; reach 10 feet when evolved only); Damage 1d4 piercing plus 1 additional void (1d6 piercing plus 1 additional void when evolved only)

Evolution Condition Helping hydgwyn complete a great quest or many smaller quests.

Elemental Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.7IdpIxeVmJmkHyYq]{Exploit Frailty}Your death powers are more dangerous against infirm creatures. Your death powers that cause the clumsy and enfeebled condition for 1 round cause those conditions to last until the end of your next turn instead. You gain a status bonus to damage with your death powers equal to the highest of a creature’s clumsy, drained, enfeebled, or sickened value they received from your death powers, to a maximum of +2. If you’re an expert in power DCs, the maximum status bonus to damage with your death powers is +4. If you’re a master, the status bonus increases by 1 as long as a creature has at least one of the listed four conditions at any value, to a total maximum of +5, and if you’re legendary, the status bonus increases by a total of 2 as long as a creature has at least one of the listed four conditions at any value, to a total maximum of +6.

Form Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.nytafJNB40a3qUCl]{Questing Beast}You can be a guiding star for others to reach their quest or a willo’- wisp leading them astray. As a single action, which has the concentrate and mental trait, you can attempt a Deception check against the lower of the Perception DC or Will DC of a creature within 30 feet. On a success, you choose whether to give them a +1 circumstance bonus on their next Perception check or Will save within 1 round or to make them stupefied 1 for 1 round. On a critical success, you can grant a +2 circumstance bonus or make the creature stupefied 2.

Evolution Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.q39xE8HMxbFHWtAs]{Spectral Flame}You can move the spectral flame that dances between your antlers like a will-o’-wisp. The spectral flame provides dim illumination within 60 feet. As a free action, once per turn, you can turn the flame off or on, or move the flame up to 60 feet. As long as the flame is in your space, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Deception checks to use your questing beast ability.

Iognu.name: Iognu
Iognu.description:
Iognu, Wildebuzz, and Shockonno

Element Electricity

Attribute Modifiers Str +2, Dex +1, Con +3, Int +0, Wis +4, Cha - 1

Eldamon Language Voltan

Eldamon Hit Points 6

Eldamon Skills Acrobatics, Athletics, Survival

Eldamon Saving Throw Fortitude

Senses low-light vision

Resistance air, electricity, metal

Weaknesses earth, mental, teleportation

Speed 25 feet

Melee 1 horn (agile, finesse; reach 10 feet when evolved only); Damage 1d4 electricity (1d6 electricity when evolved only)

Melee 1 foot; Damage 1d6 bludgeoning (1d8 bludgeoning when evolved only)

Evolution Condition Helping iognu taste a magnificent storm.

Elemental Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.GCGJ9Rpz92G2uLg9]{Rampaging}Your electric charges rampage through your foes, allowing them to occasionally cling even after they suffer electricity damage. When a foe shocked from your elemental powers takes electricity damage from your elemental powers, the foe must attempt a DC 5 flat check. On a success, they lose the shocked condition as normal, whereas on a failure, they retain the charge and remain shocked. However, this doesn’t extend the duration of their shocked condition.

Form Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.bICCgJdrrAciyjOe]{Static Fur}Your fur gathers up electricity when you charge and rampage around. If you spend at least three of your actions on your turn to Stride and don’t use a power on that turn, you become charged at the end of the turn.

Evolution Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.kcz5gHrGo78HMkaE]{Lightning Rod Tail} When an electricity effect targets a creature within 30 feet of you or includes a line within 30 feet of you, if it could have targeted you or aimed the line to hit you, you can choose to attempt a counteract check using your power DC - 10 as your counteract modifier and half your level (rounded up) as your counteract level. If you succeed, instead of ending the effect, you force it to target you, or to aim to include you. If there are several ways to do so, the originator makes all other decisions as long as they target or include you.

Kagekko.name: Kagekko
Kagekko.description:
Kagekko, Geckrepuscle, and Geckhonsu

Element Darkness

Attribute Modifiers Str +1, Dex +2, Con +3, Int +0, Wis +4, Cha -1

Eldamon Language Shadowtongue

Eldamon Hit Points 4

Eldamon Skills Acrobatics, Athletics, Stealth

Eldamon Saving Throw Will

Senses greater darkvision

Resistance darkness, mental, shadow, spirit

Weaknesses body, light, sonic

Speed 25 feet

Melee 1 jaws (agile, finesse, reach 10 feet when evolved only); Damage 1d4 piercing (1d6 piercing when evolved only)

Evolution Condition Helping kagekko not only learn how to make truly comprehensive contingencies, but also realize that sometimes the time comes to let something drop and not worry about having a backup plan.

Elemental Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.1ZMzXDwwYipZShTG]{Contingent Shroud}You’re ready for anything with a shroud to protect you from harm. When you roll initiative, you become shrouded 1 until the end of your first turn in combat. This also applies if you phase into combat on the first round of combat.

Form Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.vtbNfXKIsaqN6NlV]{Gecko Tongue}Your tongue is especially long, with a reach of 10 feet. You can use your tongue to make limited manipulate actions from a distance that don’t require fingers or significant manual dexterity (such as opening a door) or to Grapple a creature.

Evolution Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.z4HBOpGY4V0itDsy]{Sixfold Spiked Legs}You gain a third pair of legs that are covered with spikes. Your land Speed increases to 30 feet, and when you move through a foe’s space (usually either because you are three sizes larger or you Tumbled Through their space), they take 1d8 piercing damage. A creature only takes this piercing damage once per round, no matter how many times you move through this space. Your tongue’s reach increases to 20 feet.

Klorse.name: Klorse
Klorse.description:
Klorse, Ebona, and Dethadatta

Element Death

Attribute Modifiers Str +2, Dex +1, Con +3, Int -1, Wis +4, Cha +0

Eldamon Language Requian

Eldamon Hit Points 6

Eldamon Skills Acrobatics, Athletics, Intimidation

Eldamon Saving Throw Fortitude

Senses low-light vision

Resistance poison, void

Weaknesses light, spirit

Speed 40 feet

Melee 1 hoof (reach 10 feet when evolved only); Damage 1d6 bludgeoning (1d8 bludgeoning when evolved only)

Evolution Condition Helping klorse experience enough of other realms.

Elemental Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.5rDKIZ7ISqsQ69vG]{Because I Could Not Stop for Death}You can swathe yourself with death energy as you move, and when this dissuades your foes from stopping you, you gain a burst of speed. You gain the death elemental locomotion ability. During a Stride using that ability, if at least one foe chooses to allow you to move through its space, you can move 10 additional feet beyond the movement your land Speed would normally allow.

Form Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.rtNBqja6llG0IfEq]{Riding a Pale Horse}Your base land Speed is 40 feet instead of 25 feet. This benefit is already reflected in your statistics.

Evolution Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.qozgSARBEE9rKGmZ]{Dry Bones}Your skeletal form protects you from various forms of harm. You gain resistance 5 against cold, electricity, fire, piercing, and slashing.

Larvapor.name: Larvapor
Larvapor.description:
Larvapor, Levidop, and Blowbyx

Element Air

Attribute Modifiers Str -1, Dex +3, Con +2, Int +1, Wis +4, Cha +0

Eldamon Language Sussuran

Eldamon Hit Points 4

Eldamon Skills Acrobatics, Stealth, Survival

Eldamon Saving Throw Reflex

Senses low-light vision

Resistance air, body, earth, plant, wood

Weaknesses cold, electricity, metal, teleportation

Speed 10 feet, fly 25 feet

Melee 1 wing (agile, finesse; reach 10 feet when evolved only); Damage 1d4 slashing (1d6 slashing when evolved only)

Evolution Condition Helping larvapor discover something incredibly soft and fluffy.

Elemental Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.NNsrJ1htVCEo22Gt]{Enveloping Air} You call upon the essence of air to increase the area of your air powers. You can choose for your air powers with a line area to increase their length by up to 10 feet (for instance, a 20-foot line to a 30-foot line), and your air powers with cone, burst, and emanation areas to increase their length or radius by 5 feet (for instance, a 25-foot cone to a 30-foot cone). If you’re a master in power DC, these improve to 20 feet of length for lines and 10 feet of length or radius for cones, bursts, and emanations.

Form Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.xhZ2DOcsZqoMKkxl]{Air Antennae} Your antennae provide you the ability to smell things from a distance. You gain scent as an imprecise sense out to 60 feet. As normal for scent, this is adjusted based on if the source of the smell is upwind or downwind.

Evolution Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.s1YaYo5RMGPlH9jo]{Silken Puff} You surround yourself in a puff of airy silk, providing you something akin to cover against ranged attacks and damaging area effects. The puff grants you a +1 circumstance bonus to AC against ranged attacks and to Reflex saves against damaging effects.

Lemiure.name: Lemiure
Lemiure.description:
Lemiure, Lemurux, and Lughemur

Element Light

Attribute Modifiers Str -1, Dex +3, Con +2, Int +0, Wis +4, Cha +1

Eldamon Language Luxan

Eldamon Hit Points 6

Eldamon Skills Acrobatics, Intimidation, Survival

Eldamon Saving Throw Reflex

Senses low-light vision

Resistance death, force, light

Weaknesses darkness, mental, shadow, sonic

Speed 25 feet

Melee 1 claw (agile, finesse, reach 10 feet when evolved only); Damage 1d4 slashing (1d6 slashing when evolved only)

Evolution Condition Helping lemiure learn from numerous people with different viewpoints and lived experiences.

Elemental Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.lts8ZMb504M6RO4l]{Prism Power}When your foe is limned in light, your light powers deal additional damage. While a creature has the limned condition, you gain a +1 status bonus to fire damage with light powers against that creature; this increases to +3 if you’re an expert in power DCs, +4 if you’re a master in power DCs, and +5 if you’re legendary in power DCs.

Form Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.LG9fvg69MrIKhwXq]{Prism’s Perception}The prism on your head helps refine the sights around you and refract them into your view, making it easy for you to spot things. You’re an expert in Perception, and at 9th level, you become a master in Perception.

Evolution Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.PdJxytvwDhRdoQR2]{Prismatic Cloak}The rainbow-colored cloak trailing behind you protects you from harm, especially from those dazzled by your light. You gain resistance 5 to physical damage dealt by creatures dazzled by your light powers. This resistance increases to 6 at level 18.

Lepismini.name: Lepismini
Lepismini.description:
Lepismini, Lepismurk, and Zygentomurkia

Element Darkness

Attribute Modifiers Str +2, Dex +1, Con +3, Int +0, Wis +4, Cha - 1

Eldamon Language Shadowtongue

Eldamon Hit Points 4

Eldamon Skills Acrobatics, Athletics, Stealth

Eldamon Saving Throw Reflex

Senses greater darkvision

Resistance darkness, mental, shadow, spirit

Weaknesses body, light, sonic

Speed 25 feet (35 feet in dim light or darkness)

Melee 1 tail (reach 10 feet when evolved only); Damage 1d6 piercing (1d8 piercing when evolved only)

Evolution Condition Helping lepismini truly understand and come to terms with their love of enclosed spaces enough that they can be willing to accept the wider world around them.

Elemental Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.4NoDbSptJKk8SEWc]{Hidden Shadow}When you’re shrouded in darkness, you can Hide and Sneak more easily, crawling into every little nook and cranny. Your circumstance bonus to Stealth checks to Hide and Sneak from the shrouded condition increases to +2 when you’re shrouded 1, +3 when you’re shrouded 2, and +4 when you’re shrouded 3.

Form Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.tBfrdv1KLk1VYXgR]{Spiked Carapace}Your carapace is covered in spikes. A creature that hits you with a melee unarmed Strike or a non-reach melee Strike takes piercing damage equal to half your level (minimum 1), with a basic Reflex save against your power DC.

Evolution Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.u2NLMgtlItPSkcCo]{Mantle of Darkness}Your ruff transformed into a mantle of swirling shadows that settle around you when you aren’t moving, such as when holding still in a narrow place. You can Hide (though not Sneak) without cover or concealment, and if you don’t act for 1 round (or about 6 seconds out of a combat encounter), you become concealed by the mantle of darkness until you move or make a significant motion.

Lotusnek.name: Lotusnek
Lotusnek.description:
Lotusnek, Lotuserpent, and Hydranther

Element Wood

Attribute Modifiers Str -1, Dex +3, Con +2, Int +0, Wis +4, Cha +1

Eldamon Language Muan

Eldamon Hit Points 6

Eldamon Skills Acrobatics, Stealth, Survival

Eldamon Saving Throw Will

Senses low-light vision

Resistance earth, plant, time, water, wood

Weaknesses acid, air, cold, fire, poison

Speed 25 feet

Melee 1 fangs (agile, finesse, reach 10 feet when evolved only); Damage 1d4 piercing (1d6 piercing when evolved only)

Evolution Condition Helping lotusnek reach the deepest levels of meditation on their triune nature.

Elemental Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.wRyBoS0V62zGDOPl]{Power of Three} When you harvest wood elemental energy, you bring down your wrath on your foes threefold. When you harvest with a damaging power, you gain a +2 status bonus to the power’s damage against creatures with a harvested plant in their square. This increases to +4 if you’re an expert in power DC, +5 if you’re a master in power DC, and +6 if you’re legendary in power DC.

Form Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.2N7X1nTf8LwfmS8q]{Energy Flower} You travel entwined around a flower filled with wood energy (or use your three heads for the same effect if you’re in your evolved form). This is a sowed plant in your own space that moves with you and doesn’t impair your movement. When you first enter battle form or evolved form, the flower is energized, allowing you to harvest it. Once harvested, the flower doesn’t visually disappear, but it loses its energy until the next time you enter battle or evolved form.

Evolution Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.5eeiCwl5HNOL9cse]{Triple Time} Three heads are better than one, so split up an area power’s effect among your three heads. When you use a damaging power in a cone, line, or burst with a length or radius of at least 30 feet, you can instead create three smaller effects, one from each head. If you do, you create three lines or cones with 1/3 the original length (rounded down) or three bursts with 1/3 the original radius (rounded down). Even if a creature is in the area of more than one of the cones, lines, or bursts, it still only takes the effects of the power once.

Luciola.name: Luciola
Luciola.description:
Luciola, Lampyra, and Lampyrios

Element Light

Attribute Modifiers Str +1, Dex +2, Con +3, Int -1, Wis +4, Cha +0

Eldamon Language Luxan

Eldamon Hit Points 6

Eldamon Skills Acrobatics, Athletics, Intimidation

Eldamon Saving Throw Fortitude

Senses low-light vision

Resistance death, force, light

Weaknesses darkness, mental, shadow, sonic

Speed 25 feet

Melee 1 mandibles (agile, finesse, reach 10 feet when evolved only); Damage 1d4 piercing (1d6 piercing plus 1d4 fire when evolved only)

Evolution Condition Helping luciola learn to embrace their optimism and also temper it with realism.

Elemental Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.kUPYHbhmWgdZ8yiy]{Phosphorescent Glow}After your initial flash of light, you leave a momentary phosphorescent glow. When the limned condition from your light power or surge ends, a pale blue glow limns the target for 1 additional round. This limned condition doesn’t come from the original power, so it doesn’t apply any additional effects from that power.

Form Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.L5ABzVEGhXdS2gih]{Glowing Tail}The glowing light energy stored in your tail allows you to combine your powers with a surge. While your tail is glowing, you can put your tail’s glow out in order to use an elemental surge and an elemental power in the same turn, ignoring the usual restrictions that prevent you from using both in the same turn. Afterward, it takes 10 minutes before the gathering light energy restores the glow within your tail.

Evolution Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.PKCsValalpASiWK8]{Inner Light}The light within you spills out to sear your foes when you make a mandibles attack or when another creature cuts or pierces into you. Your mandibles Strikes deal 1d4 additional fire damage (reflected in the statistics above); this additional damage has the light trait. Additionally, when an adjacent creature deals slashing or piercing damage to you or a creature deals slashing or piercing damage to you with a melee unarmed attack, they take 1d4 fire damage; this fire damage has the light trait.

Manight.name: Manight
Manight.description:
Manight, Manut, and Manyx

Element Darkness

Attribute Modifiers Str +1, Dex +3, Con +2, Int +0, Wis +4, Cha -1

Eldamon Language Shadowtongue

Eldamon Hit Points 4

Eldamon Skills Acrobatics, Athletics, Stealth

Eldamon Saving Throw Will

Senses greater darkvision

Resistance darkness, mental, shadow, spirit

Weaknesses body, light, sonic

Speed 25 feet

Melee 1 jaws (agile, finesse, reach 10 feet when evolved only); Damage 1d4 piercing (1d6 piercing when evolved only)

Evolution Condition Helping manight keep trying, over and over again, until they finally do things perfectly and reach the consummation of their perseverance.

Elemental Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.5V2JgBFOVGdlyKDr]{Invisible Hand}When you’re hidden or undetected due to your darkness powers, your darkness powers are more powerful. While you are hidden or undetected to a creature either due to the shrouded condition from your darkness powers or due to an area of dim light or darkness from your darkness powers, you gain a +2 status bonus to cold damage with darkness powers against that creature; this increases to +4 if you’re an expert in power DCs, +5 if you’re a master in power DCs, and +6 if you’re legendary in power DCs. This bonus doesn’t apply if you’re hidden or undetected for another reason (such as an invisibility spell).

Form Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.sgPYEiP9v4Ycvdre]{Shadow Eruption}The top of your hand body erupts with cold lightless flames of darkness energy when you use darkness powers. Whenever you use a darkness power, for 1 round, a creature that hits you with a melee unarmed Strike or a non-reach melee Strike takes cold damage equal to half your level (minimum 1), with a basic Reflex save against your power DC.

Evolution Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.vBM198hgjxL0kcMn]{Handy Eyes}Your dark magic-imbued eyes reveal other hidden creatures, helping you ambush them. You constantly gain the effects of a see the unseen spell.

Meese.name: Meese
Meese.description:
Meese, Rhoden, and Psyrat

Element Mind

Attribute Modifiers Str -1, Dex +3, Con +2, Int +0, Wis +4, Cha +1

Eldamon Language Astral

Eldamon Hit Points 4

Eldamon Skills Acrobatics, Intimidation, Stealth

Eldamon Saving Throw Will

Senses low-light vision

Resistance electricity, light, mind, teleportation

Weaknesses darkness, sonic, spirit, time

Speed 25 feet

Melee 1 tail (agile, finesse, reach 20 feet when evolved only); Damage 1d4 bludgeoning plus 1 mental (1d6 bludgeoning plus 1 mental when evolved only)

Evolution Condition Helping meese reach a pinnacle in their love for gemstones (such as by finding a truly amazing gem or completing a collection of different gems).

Elemental Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.qZqrUQbBplSjEbrv]{Exploit Lapse}Your mind powers deal more damage to creatures whose mind is vulnerable due to being befuddled or afraid. You gain a status bonus to damage with your mind powers equal to the highest of a creature’s stupefied value from any source or their frightened value they received from your mind powers, your Demoralize, or your mortal friend’s Demoralize if you’re an eldamon, to a maximum of +2. If you’re an expert in power DCs, the maximum status bonus to damage with your mind powers is +3. If you’re a master, the status bonus increases by 1 as long as a creature is either frightened or stupefied at any value, to a total maximum of +5, and if you’re legendary, the status bonus increases by a total of 2 as long as a creature is frightened or stupefied at any value, to a total maximum of +6.

Form Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.Gy5ILwWf8DABKI8d]{Amethyst Sled}You use a mind amethyst to sled across scattered rubble, sand, or snow with ease. You ignore difficult terrain from rubble, sand, or snow.

Evolution Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.K8B5EiosL97u0Buo]{Quadruple Tails}Your tails split into four spiralling tails, increasing their reach to 20 feet. Additionally, your four tails help you steady your increasingly powerful amethyst sled, allowing you ignore all difficult terrain on the ground, not just difficult terrain from rubble, sand, or snow.

Morpup.name: Morpup
Morpup.description:
Morpup, Morhound, and Morgarm

Element Death

Attribute Modifiers Str +0, Dex +3, Con +2, Int -1, Wis +4, Cha +1

Eldamon Language Requian

Eldamon Hit Points 6

Eldamon Skills Acrobatics, Athletics, Intimidation

Eldamon Saving Throw Reflex

Senses low-light vision

Resistance poison, void

Weaknesses light, spirit

Speed 25 feet

Melee 1 jaws (agile, finesse; reach 10 feet when evolved only); Damage 1d4 piercing (1d6 piercing when evolved only)

Evolution Condition Helping morpup return safely from a dangerous situation, long journey, or the like.

Elemental Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.5mmSPqcPg7otUoiI]{Rebirth}When you would be reduced to 0 Hit Points, you are reborn and rise again. Instead of being reduced to 0 Hit Points, you remain at 1 Hit Point and gain temporary Hit Points equal to your level. Once you’ve benefited from rebirth, you can’t benefit from it again for 1d4 hours.

Form Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.so5jxRhs5ABtvFBi]{Scarf Glide}Your scarf allows you to glide through the air. As a single action, which has the move trait, you move 5 feet toward the ground and up to 25 feet through the air. Like flying eldamon, you land on the ground at the end of your turn if you aren’t combined with your eldamon trainer through Melded Phase, though you can Arrest the Fall.

Evolution Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.hh0ibZoLPRoNn3kv]{Red String of Fate}You can use the unraveled strings of your scarf to latch onto foes at quite a distance, tying their fate to you. You can Grapple foes at a distance of up to 20 feet. Foes grabbed by your scarf take a -1 circumstance penalty to Fortitude saves against your death powers.
