Pengil.name: Pengil
Pengil.description:
Pengil, Aptenow, and Sphenicicle

Element Ice

Attribute Modifiers Str -1, Dex +3, Con +2, Int +1, Wis +4, Cha +0

Eldamon Language Cryan

Eldamon Hit Points 6

Eldamon Skills Acrobatics, Athletics, Survival

Eldamon Saving Throw Reflex

Senses low-light vision

Resistance cold, plant, sonic, time, wood

Weaknesses body, earth, fire, metal

Speed 25 feet

Melee 1 claw (agile, finesse; reach 10 feet when evolved only); Damage 1d4 cold (1d6 cold when evolved only)

Evolution Condition Helping pengil enjoy an epic sledding experience.

Elemental Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.Vvsz2IjoAKW7DdFt]{Icewalker}You ignore difficult terrain and greater difficult terrain from ice and snow and don’t risk falling when crossing ice. You reduce the penalty to your Speeds from the frozen condition by 10 feet.

Form Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.STUnpqmdpv20oNDs]{Slide}When you slide on your belly, you can move faster in a straight line. Whenever you Stride, you can choose to slide on your belly. If you do, you must move in a straight line, but you gain a +15-foot circumstance bonus to your Speed.

Evolution Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.VD2oRo0b2iBZyDI8]{Cloak of Snow}A cloak of snow along your back protects you while sliding and enhances your ability to slide. You gain a +25-foot circumstance bonus to your Speed when you use your slide ability, instead of a +15-foot circumstance bonus. You are concealed by the cloak of snow while moving, and you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC while moving using your slide ability.

Shadoppy.name: Shadoppy
Shadoppy.description:
Shadoppy, Shadopossum, and Shadelphis

Element Darkness

Attribute Modifiers Str +0, Dex +2, Con +3, Int -1, Wis +4, Cha +1

Eldamon Language Shadowtongue

Eldamon Hit Points 4

Eldamon Skills Acrobatics, Intimidation, Stealth

Eldamon Saving Throw Fortitude

Senses greater darkvision

Resistance darkness, mental, shadow, spirit

Weaknesses body, light, sonic

Speed 25 feet (fly 25 feet when evolved only)

Melee 1 bone jaws (finesse, reach 10 feet when evolved only); Damage 1d6 piercing (1d8 piercing when evolved only)

Melee 1 claw (agile, finesse, reach 10 feet when evolved only); Damage 1d4 slashing (1d6 slashing when evolved only)

Evolution Condition Helping shadoppy actualize their fascination with bones by completing their collection or reaching a deep understanding of bones.

Elemental Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.DRqSregb5OP489c6]{Shrouded Power}When you’re shrouded in darkness, your darkness powers deal additional damage. While you have the shrouded condition, you gain a +1 status bonus to cold damage with darkness powers; this increases to +3 if you’re an expert in power DCs, +4 if you’re a master in power DCs, and +5 if you’re legendary in power DCs.

Form Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.piTNPCRDwWg4h8v2]{Bone Mantle}Your covered in protective bones that prevent the worst from happening. Your protective bone mantle grants you resistance equal to half your level (minimum 1) to critical hits. This resistance can’t reduce the damage from a critical hit lower than the damage from a normal hit.

Evolution Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.yVT9zHK9tDigNyLW]{Shadow Flight}The bottom of your body trails away into shadows, allowing you to soar. You gain a fly Speed equal to your Speed, and your body of twisting shadow gives you a +1 circumstance bonus to Acrobatics checks made to Escape.

Melee 1 force hand (agile, finesse, reach 10 feet when evolved only); Damage 1d4 force (1d6 force when evolved only)

Evolution Condition Helping psyrano ascend to new heights of abstruse conversation.

Elemental Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.h0wyPftsLTZu7aNa]{Telekinetic Storm}Whether you’re trying to disguise your force powers as a different kind of power or just enjoy moving objects around, you deliver force powers via objects even when others would use aether, pure threads of spun force. Any time your force power would deal force damage, you can choose to have it deal bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing damage instead (your choice) via the use of small objects. If the power would already throw an object and deal one of those damage types, you instead gain a +1 status bonus to the damage roll; this status bonus increases to +2 if you’re an expert in power DCs, +3 if you’re a master in power DCs, and +4 if you’re legendary in power DCs.

Form Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.TPchxFEguMMr06Tp]{Force Hands}Your tiny arms can’t do much on their own, but you keep force hands of aether manifested whenever you desire, and those pack quite a punch. When you use Athletics to Grapple, Shove, or Trip, you can use your giant force hands to assist you. If you do, you use your Intelligence modifier instead of your Strength modifier, and you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to your Athletics check. When you use a force power that doesn’t deal force damage, you can attempt a Deception check against the higher of an observer’s Perception, Nature, or Occultism DC to trick them into thinking you are using a mind power instead of a force power.

Evolution Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.ZCsLwAfMSjjZIomp]{Aetheric Spikes}You are covered in spikes made of aether that damage your foes with force. A creature that attempts a melee unarmed Strike or a non-reach melee Strike against you (whether or not it hits you) takes 4 force damage, with a basic Reflex save against your power DC. At 19th level, this increases to 5 force damage.

Puhide.name: Puhide
Puhide.description:
Puhide, Anguillake, and Qinglongue

Element Water

Attribute Modifiers Str +1, Dex +3, Con +2, Int +0, Wis +4, Cha -1

Eldamon Language Thalassic

Eldamon Hit Points 6

Eldamon Skills Acrobatics, Athletics, Stealth

Eldamon Saving Throw Reflex

Senses low-light vision

Resistance fire, water

Weaknesses electricity, plant, wood

Speed 20 feet, swim 25 feet

Melee 1 jaws (agile, finesse, reach 10 feet when evolved only); Damage 1d4 piercing (1d6 piercing when evolved only)

Evolution Condition Helping puhide accept and work through their nerves and fear.

Elemental Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.rXSomKuwkrJ9eZL6]{Sinuous Backflow}When you use an area water power, if you’re in the area, or your area water power originates from your square (such as a line or cone area power), you can choose to let your power move you any of the same distances your allies can choose to move. However, you move in the opposite direction as the other creatures. For example, this means you move back and away from a high tide line or cone, further distancing yourself from any foes who were pushed back, and toward a low tide line or cone, further approaching foes who were pulled toward you. If the area power is a burst or an emanation, and it’s centered on you, you can move in whichever direction you choose regardless of the tide.

Form Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.6baOd78xOANAHjPq]{Slippery Eel}It’s especially difficult for your foes to hold onto you or find you when you’re hiding from them. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to checks to Escape and to Stealth checks to Hide. If you roll a success on a check to Escape, you get a critical success instead.

Evolution Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.AARylStYyPWyUNoV]{Dragon Soul}Your confidence surges, granting you the soul of a dragon to dispel your fears. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against fear effects. When you roll a success at a Will save against a fear effect, you get a critical success instead. In addition, anytime you gain the frightened condition, reduce its value by 1.

Sanditt.name: Sanditt
Sanditt.description:
Sanditt, Sanderma, and Sandrak

Element Earth

Attribute Modifiers Str +1, Dex +2, Con +3, Int -1, Wis +4, Cha +0

Eldamon Language Petran

Eldamon Hit Points 8

Eldamon Skills Performance, Stealth, Survival

Eldamon Saving Throw Fortitude

Senses low-light vision

Resistance earth, electricity, fire, teleportation

Weaknesses air, plant, sonic, water, wood

Speed 25 feet

Melee 1 jaws; Damage 1d6 slashing (1d8 slashing when evolved only)

Melee 1 tail (agile, finesse, reach 10 feet when evolved only); Damage 1d4 bludgeoning (1d6 bludgeoning when evolved only)

Evolution Condition Helping sanditt overcome their shyness and put on a truly wonderful skit or puppet show.

Elemental Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.Eum7xZo3Pfou7CoZ]{Protrusive Cover}Your earth power seeps out of you, allowing you to grant your allies additional cover. Whenever you give your allies lesser cover against an attack made through your space, you grant them a +2 circumstance bonus to AC instead of the usual +1 circumstance bonus to AC.

Form Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.erZ78Orbjl8zoZ7y]{Sand Shroud}When you’re hit, you shroud yourself with sand that conceals you from follow-up attacks. If a creature hits you with a Strike, the impact launches a shroud of sand, causing you to become concealed by the sand until the end of that creature’s turn.

Evolution Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.orLKj7nXd5j6REbo]{Puppet Tail}Your tail can lure foes off guard and distract them. As a single action, you can attempt a Performance check against a creature’s Perception DC, causing them to become off-guard until the end of your next turn on a success. If you attempt a tail Strike, after resolving the Strike, the target becomes off-guard until the end of your turn unless the Strike was a critical failure. While a foe is off-guard due to your tail, your movements don’t trigger reactions from that foe based on movement (such as Reactive Strikes and similar reactions).

Simiens.name: Simiens
Simiens.description:
Simiens, Mnemonkey, and Semnostic 

Element Mind

Attribute Modifiers Str +0, Dex +3, Con +2, Int +1, Wis +4, Cha -1

Eldamon Language Astral

Eldamon Hit Points 4

Eldamon Skills Acrobatics, Intimidation, Stealth

Eldamon Saving Throw Will

Senses low-light vision

Resistance electricity, light, mind, teleportation

Weaknesses darkness, sonic, spirit, time

Speed 25 feet

Melee 1 jaws (agile, finesse, reach 10 feet when evolved only); Damage 1d4 piercing (1d6 piercing when evolved only)

Evolution Condition Helping simiens reach a philosophical breakthrough.

Elemental Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.tTp3liVgzC6nxBz4]{Moment of Contemplation}When you pause for a moment to contemplate during a battle, your mental defenses increase. During a combat encounter, when you use a refresh power or a surge on your turn and don’t use an active power, you gain a +2 status bonus to Will saves until your next turn. If you use Mind Palace, you gain a +4 status bonus instead.

Form Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.7xWNnjOKLggbxZtj]{Manual Dexterity}As a monkey, you have more manual dexterity than other eldamon. You can perform Interact actions and hold basic objects. This doesn’t allow you to wield weapons, shields, or most held magical or alchemical items, though you can pick up and feed yourself potions, elixirs, and similar simple potables.

Evolution Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.JlfJPrSbQfq2nSX8]{Mental Wreath}Your head and upper body are wreathed with powerful mental energy. A creature that attempts a melee unarmed Strike or a non-reach melee Strike against you (whether or not it hits you) takes 4 mental damage, with a basic Will save against your power DC. At 19th level, this increases to 5 mental damage.

Squishberry.name: Squishberry
Squishberry.description:
Squishberry, Fragarios, and Helixion

Element Wood

Size Squishberry’s evolved form, Helixion, is Huge instead of Large.

Attribute Modifiers Str +2, Dex +1, Con +3, Int -1, Wis +4, Cha +0

Eldamon Language Muan

Eldamon Hit Points 6

Eldamon Skills Acrobatics, Athletics, Survival

Eldamon Saving Throw Fortitude

Senses low-light vision

Resistance earth, plant, time, water, wood

Weaknesses acid, air, cold, fire, poison

Speed 25 feet

Melee 1 body (reach 20 feet when evolved only); Damage 1d6 bludgeoning (1d8 bludgeoning when evolved only)

Evolution Condition Helping squishberry tend a garden with a truly diverse arrangement of plants, or a few especially rare plants.

Elemental Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.mXgemyKCSG7D1Puu]{Green Thumb}When you sow plants, you sow more. Any time you sow with a power, sow in a square adjacent to the area where you already sowed. If you’re an expert in power DC, you sow in two additional adjacent squares, if you’re a master in power DC, you sow in three additional adjacent squares, and if you’re legendary in power DC, you sow in four additional adjacent squares.

Form Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.KfUdnbFBZ2u0OL7t]{Retreat Into Strawberry}As a single action, you can Retreat Into your Shell. If you do, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC and are immobilized. These effects last until the end of your next turn, though you can end the effect early with a single action.

Evolution Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.TPeuNdpvPvJJdp5X]{Massive Growth}You grow larger than most evolved forms, and the reach of your massive body is even greater than normal. You are Huge, instead of Large, and your body has a 20 foot reach; the reach has been reflected in the above statistics.

Sundile.name: Sundile
Sundile.description:
Sundile, Arcadile, and Rainbowbek

Element Light

Attribute Modifiers Str +0, Dex +3, Con +2, Int +1, Wis +4, Cha - 1

Eldamon Language Luxan

Eldamon Hit Points 6

Eldamon Skills Acrobatics, Art Lore, Survival

Eldamon Saving Throw Reflex

Senses low-light vision

Resistance death, force, light

Weaknesses darkness, mental, shadow, sonic

Speed 25 feet

Melee 1 jaws (agile, finesse, reach 10 feet when evolved only); Damage 1d4 piercing (1d6 piercing when evolved only)

Evolution Condition Helping sundile complete an artistic masterpiece that truly embodies their vision.

Elemental Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.ns0YFb7wVwJ8yiNp]{Rainbow Light}When you deal damage with your light powers, instead of dealing fire damage, roll 1d8. On a 1 the light is red and your power deals fire damage, on a 2 the light is orange and your power deals acid damage, on a 3 the light is yellow and your power deals electricity damage, on a 4 the light is green and your power deals poison damage, on a 5 the light is blue and your power deals sonic damage, on a 6 the light is indigo and your power deals mental damage, and on a 7 the light is violet and your power deals force damage. On an 8, you choose one of the 7 colors and damage types. If your power deals damage over time, you still only roll once to determine the color of the light and deal that damage type for the duration of the power.

Form Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.FFVVgM1RVmsT1m0X]{Chromatic Ridges}Your ridges take on a coloration based on your mood, granting you resistance to a random energy type. When you phase in, or at the beginning of an encounter if you’re already phased in, roll 1d8 and consult the colors and damage types from the rainbow light elemental ability. Your ridges take on the color you rolled (or the color you chose if you roll an 8), and you gain resistance equal to your level to the associated damage type. On a roll of 7, this resistance to force is cumulative with your base resistance from being a light eldamon.

Evolution Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.MEKjthSYtlZHvG3F]{Rainbow Banner}The rainbow banner that flies from your tail can inspire your allies. Allies within 30 feet who can see the banner gain a +1 status bonus to saving throws against fear, and you can wave the banner as a single action in order to prepare to Aid an ally’s attack roll using Art Lore.

Tairopoof.name: Tairopoof
Tairopoof.description:
Tairopoof, Nyctairis, and Airoptera

Element Air

Attribute Modifiers Str +0, Dex +3, Con +2, Int +1, Wis +4, Cha -1

Eldamon Language Sussuran

Eldamon Hit Points 4

Eldamon Skills Acrobatics, Stealth, Survival

Eldamon Saving Throw Reflex

Senses low-light vision

Resistance air, body, earth, plant, wood

Weaknesses cold, electricity, metal, teleportation

Speed 10 feet, fly 25 feet

Melee 1 claw (agile, finesse; reach 10 feet when evolved only); Damage 1d4 slashing (1d6 slashing when evolved only)

Melee 1 jaws (finesse, reach 10 feet when evolved only); Damage 1d4 piercing (1d6 piercing when evolved only)

Evolution Condition Helping tairopoof overcome their anxiety toward their body and scaring others.

Elemental Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.9IuGx5CmbiQ39ILj]{Wind Speed}Air energy speeds you up when using your air powers to move. You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speeds while moving with an air power. This increases to a +20-foot status bonus if you’re an expert in power DC, a +30- foot status bonus if you’re a master in power DC, and a +40-foot status bonus if you’re legendary in power DC.

Form Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.zcxDnhekhB0UKB7Y]{Air Wings}Your wings are formed entirely out of air, providing you significantly greater maneuverability in flight than most other creatures. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Acrobatics checks to Maneuver in Flight and Arrest a Fall.

Evolution Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.zBfJhio4Zc86GVHx]{Air Unleashed}The unleashed power of air allows you to move with unrestricted mobility. Flying upward isn’t difficult terrain to you, and you don’t have to end the turn by descending to the ground, even if you aren’t combined with an eldamon trainer using Melded Phase.

Element Electricity

Attribute Modifiers Str +1, Dex +2, Con +3, Int -1, Wis +4, Cha +0

Eldamon Language Voltan

Eldamon Hit Points 6

Eldamon Skills Athletics, Intimidation, Survival

Eldamon Saving Throw Fortitude

Senses low-light vision

Resistance air, electricity, metal

Weaknesses earth, mental, teleportation

Speed 25 feet

Melee 1 tail (agile, finesse; reach 10 feet when evolved only); Damage 1d4 electricity (1d6 electricity when evolved only)

Melee 1 horn; Damage 1d6 piercing (1d8 piercing when evolved only)

Evolution Condition Helping tawhirtle experience pure thrill from their risks.

Elemental Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.FBc2TxqWSRomT9fC]{Resistant Shell}You have an outer shell of energy that’s electrically resistant, allowing you to safely store charge. When you are charged from your own elemental powers, you don’t become shocked, and you don’t reduce your charged condition from effects that would remove the shocked condition.

Form Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.hkwTJA1O2oEUR1Cv]{Retreat Into Shell}As a single action, you can Retreat Into your Shell. If you do, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to AC and are immobilized. These effects last until the end of your next turn, though you can end the effect early with a single action.

Evolution Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.hnll5yw6aq6xS6Zz]{Shell Fortification}Your shell fortifies you from dangerous blows. You gain resistance equal to half your level to precision damage, and when a creature critically hits you, you can attempt a DC 17 flat check. On a success, the critical hit becomes a normal hit instead.

Tsurikabe.name: Tsurikabe
Tsurikabe.description:
Tsurikabe, Furikabe, and Murikabe

Element Force

Attribute Modifiers Str +2, Dex +1, Con +3, Int -1, Wis +4, Cha +0

Eldamon Language Aetheran

Eldamon Hit Points 6

Eldamon Skills Athletics, Deception, Stealth

Eldamon Saving Throw Fortitude

Senses low-light vision

Resistance force, spirit

Weaknesses death, light

Speed 25 feet

Melee 1 body (reach 10 feet when evolved only, shove when evolved only); Damage 1d6 bludgeoning (1d8 bludgeoning when evolved only)

Evolution Condition Helping tsurikabe pull off an epic baiting scheme or a series of great schemes.

Elemental Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.X6zhvuY9dJBVStFU]{Confounding Force}You bait and bedevil foes with your force powers, momentarily confounding them and weakening their next attack. When you hit a foe with a power attack roll on a force power or a foe fails their saving throw against your force power, you interfere with their next attack. The next time they deal damage before the end of your next turn, they take a -2 circumstance penalty on their damage roll. This increases to a -4 circumstance penalty if you’re an expert in power DCs, -6 if you’re a master in power DCs, and -8 if you’re legendary in power DCs.

Form Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.UtuAvOAdsrRq3Ndu]{Wall Off}Your body is essentially a wall, so it’s difficult to move through your space. While Tiny creatures can still enter your space, they can’t automatically cross through it, and they still need to Tumble Through or use a similar ability. The DC to Tumble Through or use a similar ability against you is either your power DC or the usual DC with a +2 circumstance bonus, whichever is higher.

Evolution Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.Yc2k2ZH9q7e5EABC]{Banhammer}Your hammer rebuffs creatures and bans them from returning. When you Shove with your body unarmed attack, you can use your hammer instead. If you do, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your Athletics check to Shove. If you succeed, on the target’s next turn, if it attempts to move toward you during its move action, it must succeed at a Fortitude save against your power DC; on a failure, it can’t move toward you during that move action. On a success, it can move toward you and doesn’t need to attempt any further saving throws.

Ursili.name: Ursili
Ursili.description:
Ursili, Ursalva, and Kallistos

Element Life

Attribute Modifiers Str +2, Dex +1, Con +3, Int -1, Wis +4, Cha +0

Eldamon Language Jyoti

Eldamon Hit Points 8

Eldamon Skills Athletics, Intimidation, Survival

Eldamon Saving Throw Fortitude

Senses low-light vision

Resistance light, vitality (since it isn’t undead, it can’t normally be harmed by vitality)

Weaknesses darkness, death, shadow

Speed 25 feet

Melee 1 claw (agile, finesse; reach 10 feet when evolved only); Damage 1d4 slashing plus 1 additional vitality (1d6 slashing plus 1 additional vitality when evolved only)

Evolution Condition Helping ursili experience a truly incredible rest.

Elemental Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.joAJoiq53qGVIyRU]{Resurgent Awakening}You and those you heal awake from unconsciousness with the energy you need to re-enter the fight, like a bear coming out of hibernation. Whenever you are healed from 0 Hit Points and wake up from the unconscious or dying condition, on your next turn, you are quickened but can only use the action to Stand or to Interact to pick up something you dropped when you fell unconscious. Whenever you heal a creature from 0 Hit Points with a life power and they wake up from the unconscious or dying condition, they gain the same benefit.

Form Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.M0RX2fJqcLXVzvlo]{Vital Rest}When you take a break, you surge with vital energy. During an encounter, if you don’t act for a full round (usually because of a condition such as stunned or paralyzed, or because you Delayed for an entire round until your original initiative came again), you gain temporary Hit Points equal to 2 plus your level, which last for 2 rounds.

Evolution Ability @UUID[Compendium.battlezoo-eldamon-pf2e.eldamon-features.Item.PzA1MgyWhd8o6dya]{Resurgent Life}You can spread life all around, as a single action, which has the concentrate trait. This causes living creatures such as plants to grow and move toward you, providing you standard cover until the beginning of your next turn.
